column3: Unique alphanumeric identifier for each crossing, encoding district, port of entry, and bridge abbreviation.
Official English name of the border crossing or bridge.
Type of crossing mode or vehicle category for which toll rates are listed (e.g., Pedestrian or Bicycle, Motorcycle, Passenger Vehicle, Commercial Vehicle).
Axle count or classification used for determining the southbound (U.S.-to-Mexico) toll rate for the given vehicle type.
Toll amount charged for southbound (U.S.-to-Mexico) crossings, in U.S. dollars. May note if southbound vehicle crossings are not permitted.
Axle count or classification used for determining the northbound (Mexico-to-U.S.) toll rate for the given vehicle type.
Toll amount charged for northbound (Mexico-to-U.S.) crossings, typically in Mexican pesos (MX$).
Date indicating when the toll rate information was last verified or updated.
Name(s) of the authoritative source(s) providing the toll rate data (e.g., International Bridges Steering Committee, Fideicomiso de Puentes Fronterizos).
URL linking to the Texas-side (U.S.) reference page for the crossing's toll rate information.
URL linking to the Mexican-side reference page for the crossing's toll rate information.
